extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: A true scribe devotes an entire lifetime to the creation of a single volume, a masterpiece as unique as its maker.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: T, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: T, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
You have no maximum hand size.
T: Add 1 to your mana pool.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower now stands protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.
